original_title: Father, son killed, mother injured in accident
original_body_lines: Anamaduwa, Jan. 25 (Daily Mirror)- A 38-year-old man and his 10-year-old son were killed while his wife was injured in a road accident in Labugala, Anamaduwa this morning.
The tragedy occurred when the motorcycle they were riding on crashed on to a stationary lorry in front of the Labugala Rajamaha Viharaya.
